name: Anomalous (itch) (Marcelo "Holy" Moreira)
description:
After a disaster, the city has been overrun by multiplying anomalies and your weapons seem uneffective against them! Try to scavenge your way through certain doom!

Short game done from scratch for Ludum Dare 50 under 48 hours. Made with Construct 3.

Fullscreen recommended.

The monsters can't be killed and they keep duplicating faster and faster. How long can you survive?

Controls

W, A, S, D: movement 

1, 2, 3: switch between weapons

Left mouse click: shoot gun
